entry.title: Deploying a static website on github with Jekyll & Chirpy

link.title: Deploying a static website on github with Jekyll & Chirpy

entry.summary: Deploying a static website on github with Jekyll & Chirpy Jekyll is a static site generator that transforms your plain text into beautiful static web sites and blogs. It can be use for a documentation site, a blog, an event site, or really any web site you like. It’s fast, secure, easy, and open source. It’s also the same site generator I use to maintain my open source documentation. Today...
